meta.title: Create the Future | About
meta.description: Learn about the Create the Future project created as part of the Exempt from Theory competition. Find out more about our mission and goals.
meta.keywords: about the project, exempt from theory, social project, mission, professional interviews, educational project

hero.title: About the project
hero.subtitle: Get to know us and learn more about the "Create the Future" project

mission.title: Our mission
mission.paragraph1: The Create the Future project was created as part of the Exempt from Theory competition with young people in mind who are facing career path choices. Our goal is to show what work looks like in various industries, directly from people who perform these professions daily.
mission.paragraph2: We believe that the best way to learn about a profession is to talk to someone who already does it. That's why we conduct interviews with professionals from various fields and publish them in the form of short, engaging videos on TikTok.
mission.paragraph3: We want young people to be able to make informed decisions about their professional future, based on real information, not just ideas about a given profession.
mission.zztButton: Social project within Exempt from Theory

stats.subtitle: Results of our work and project reach

education.title: Education
education.description: Providing reliable information about various professions and career paths to support the decision-making process.

inspiration.title: Inspiration
inspiration.description: Inspiring young people to discover their passions and professional interests by showing diverse career paths.

support.title: Support
support.description: Creating a community where young people can find support and inspiration in planning their professional future.

cta.title: Want to see our interviews?
cta.description: Follow us on TikTok to stay updated with new interviews and content!
